name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click to search Slate - by Lloyd

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text (Name, Email, ID) on a webpage, rightclick, then choose search slate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows the user to highlight text visible on a web screen, right click the text, and then search Slate for the users name.  

0.2.0 - Change search URL extension from hash to querystring 2023-03-09
0.1.2 - Minor tweak in what characters to remove. 7/13/2020
0.1.1 - Adjust characters that are removed from highlighted text.  Intended to remove tic-marks etc.  6/25/2020
0.1.0 - Rename Package.   6/22/2020
0.0.10 - remove punctuation from search
0.0.8 - allow background page to be impermanent
0.0.7 - add localized domain so any school can use it. Allow any school to use this extension.  Change your Slate install base by going to the settings and update your install base.  (i.e. "engage.macalester.edu").
